actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, of the United States Code to except certain marine traffic controllers employed by the Panama Canal Commission from the limitation on the rate at which overtime compensation may be paid.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to except certain nonmanagerial marine traffic controllers employed by the Panama Canal Commission from the limitation on the rate at which overtime compensation may be paid.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, of the United States Code to except certain marine traffic controllers employed by the Panama Canal Commission from the limitation on the rate at which overtime compensation may be paid.
